Directions: In a 5-qt. slow cooker, combine all of the ingredients and mix well. Cover and cook on low for 4 hours or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds ground beef, cooked and drained
1 (10 ounce) package frozen cut green beans, thawed
1 (6 ounce) package frozen pea pods, thawed
1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
